headline: Why Analysts See The Story Behind Automatic Data Processing (ADP) Shifting With New Price Targets
summary: Why the Price Target for Automatic Data Processing Is Back in Focus The recent change in the price target for Automatic Data Processing has put fresh attention on how the market is reassessing the story behind the stock. With new information feeding into updated expectations, this move reflects a shift in how analysts are framing the opportunity and the risks around it.
